title: Nossa Senhora dos Milagres (Chapels of)
body: Brás de Freitas da Silva built a chapel dedicated to Nossa Senhora dos Milagres in the parish of Monte, on the lands of his entailed estate, in the year 1661, and the annotator of the Saudades mentions a chapel of the same invocation, founded in 1662 by Pedro Ferreira de Mesquita, in the parish of Ponta do Sol.

Monte: Located in the parish of Monte, on the lands of the entailed estate of Brás de Freitas da Silva.
Ponta do Sol: Located in the parish of Ponta do Sol.
